desc: Handmade leather gear for horses and horsemen and women; bridles, belts, spurs, straps and much more. Bespoke leatherwork also available.

layout.text: Welcome to our workshop where we handmake bridles, belts and a range of leather gear for use by horsemen and women, stationhands, drovers, campdrafters, polocrosse players and others.  Everything is made by us here in Western Victoria.  Come in and have a look around.  If you don't see what you want, contact us to see if we can make it for you.  We are adding more items all the time, so make sure you come back regularly to see what's on offer.
